Articles.Content:
Hi people, I'm new to the forums and I registered to simply post a random crash when I was at the Station and pressed 'Esc'. I'll leave all the folder on the link, and as stated on the title, I only have KE installed.

[https://mega.co.nz/#F!qEpE1RaS!kgPpT5tqHAwo6lR7Cf8qPA](https://mega.co.nz/#F!qEpE1RaS!kgPpT5tqHAwo6lR7Cf8qPA)

I don't really know what could be, since is my first crash ever though I have just 13 hs. playing. Anyway thanks and see ya!
